CustomField.description: None - Will look at the existing Convert Pledge Overpayments to Gifts checkbox Legacy - Will look at the existing Convert Pledge Overpayments to Gifts checkbox Always over-pay pledge - Treated same as Convert Pledge Overpayments to Gifts false Always convert over-payment into Outright Gift UI - Treated same as Convert Pledge Overpayments to Gifts true Always convert over-payment into Outright Gift RTv2 - Treated same as Convert Pledge Overpayments to Gifts true and instead of redirecting to gift UI it will automatically create it via RTv2 Always ask the user - Modal to choose how you want to overpay
CustomField.inlineHelpText: None - Will look at the existing Convert Pledge Overpayments to Gifts checkbox Legacy - Will look at the existing Convert Pledge Overpayments to Gifts checkbox Always over-pay pledge - Treated same as Convert Pledge Overpayments to Gifts false Always convert over-payment into Outright Gift UI/RTv2 - Treated same as Convert Pledge Overpayments to Gifts true (redirect/automatically create via rtv2) Always ask the user - Modal to choose how you want to overpay
CustomField.label: Pledge Over Payment Method

value.fullName: Always convert over-payment into Outright Gift UI
value.label: Always convert over-payment into Outright Gift UI

value.fullName: Always convert over-payment into Outright Gift RTv2
value.label: Always convert over-payment into Outright Gift RTv2
